structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases

law.text: [ Text of section effective until November 22, 2011. For text effective November 22, 2011, see below.] Whoever, on a prosecution commenced within eighteen months after the commission of the crime, is convicted of winning at one time or sitting, by gaming or betting on the sides or hands of those gaming, money or goods to the value of five dollars or more, and of receiving the same or security therefor, shall forfeit double the value of such money or goods. Chapter 271: Gaming or betting; forfeiture [ Text of section as amended by 2011, 194, Sec. 51 effective November 22, 2011. For text effective until November 22, 2011, see above.] Whoever, on a prosecution commenced within eighteen months after the commission of the crime, is convicted of winning at one time or sitting, by gaming or betting on the sides or hands of those gaming, except as permitted under chapter 23K, money or goods to the value of five dollars or more, and of receiving the same or security therefor, shall forfeit double the value of such money or goods.
